text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Box 2002
University, Alabama
August 18, 1953
Mr. Prank E. Schooley
Box 234
Deltaville, Virginia
Dear Prank:
Since I have not had a reply to my wire, I had
better take the time to inform you of the change in
meeting plans and trust that this will meet with your
approval.
Both Probst and Wheatley asked that the meeting
be moved to Washington and I have reserved rooms for
us at the Willard Hotel for Thursday nigjht and Friday
night.
I hope you are blistered by too much sun, eaten
up by redbugs and mosquitos, bored with idleness, and
have ptomaine from too much seafoodâ€”you lucky dog, you.
Sincerely,
>'6raydon Ausmus,
President, NAEB
GA/jeh
